london: Get started via **The Heights of Chicanery** in The Flit.

Figure out what's going on with these people by working with
**Bats and Cats** in The Flit.
Look for **Making More Use of Bats. Or Cats.** in The Flit.
Work with Bats or Cats in The Flit to gain the full trust of one of them.
Find your way to Mahogany Hall to proceed.
Work for or betray your chosen side at Mahogany Hall.
Make final preparations for the grand séance at Mahogany Hall.
Make final preparations for the grand illusion at Mahogany Hall.
Perform the grand séance at Mahognay Hall.

Perform the grand illusion at Mahognay Hall. It must be
performed on Saturday.

You performed the grand séance! Despite what the game says,
this is the end of the story for now.

You performed the grand illusion! Despite what the game says,
this is the end of the story for now.
